dataset_id: GPM DPR and GMI (Combined Precipitation) L3 1 month 0.25 degree x 0.25 degree V06 (GPM_3CMB) at GES DISC
title: GPM DPR and GMI (Combined Precipitation) L3 1 month 0.25 degree x 0.25 degree V06 (GPM_3CMB) at GES DISC
summary:
Version 06 is the current version of the data set. Older versions will no longer be available and have been superseded by Version 06.
.

This is a precipitation product created from the combination of the Global Precipitation Measurement (GPM) Microwave Imager (GMI) and Dual-frequency Precipitation Radar (DPR) instruments.
